doc.name: UpdatedValueIcon
doc.description: An icon that displays the value of an attribute of the container, updating it as the value of the value of the attribute is updated. The attribute is assumed to be an instance of Settable, and its name is given by the parameter attributeName. The width of the display is fixed, and is given by the attribute displayWidth, which is in "n" characters.
doc.author: Edward A. Lee
